original_text: You must know what is holy. And you must know what is not holy. You must know what you can use. And you must know what you must not use to worship me.
korean_text: 그리하여야 너희가 거룩하고 속된 것을 분별하며 부정하고 정한 것을 분별하고

sentences.original_text: You must know what is holy.
And you must know what is not holy.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 무엇이 거룩하지 않은지도 알아야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You must know what you can use.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 무엇을 사용할 수 있는지 알아야 한다.

sentences.original_text: And you must know what you must not use to worship me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나를 경배하기 위해 무엇을 사용하지 말아야 하는지도 알아야 한다.
